descript.abstract: These data represent roads as lines in Grenada and St. Vincent and the Grenadines. Roads for the country of Grenada were digitized from WorldView2 2010 photos. Digitization was completed by the lab of Dr. Jacob Opadeyi at the University of the West Indies. This work was performed on non-orthorectified imagery. To match the data with current AWE datasets, Shawn Margles and Lynnette Roth of TNC shifted the files to match the orthorectified imagery. SVG roads were digitized from 2007 aerial photos, provided by the Physical Planning Department (Dornett Hull).
descript.purpose: These data were collected under the direction of The Nature Conservancy for the Ecosystem Based Adaptation in the Grenadine Bank project. This project is built on the hypothesis that the neighboring and ecologically connected small island states in the Grenadine Bank can enhance the resilience of people and nature to climate change impacts by protecting, restoring and sustainably managing marine and coastal systems and strengthening community capacity for adaptation.

idinfo.datacred: Completed 2013. Digitized by the lab of Dr. Jacob Opadeyi at UWI and shifted by Shawn Margles and Lynnette Roth with the Nature Conservancy. Contact Conservation Information Manager, caribgis@tnc.org.
